code: @Override protected RestChannelConsumer prepareRequest(RestRequest restRequest, NodeClient client) throws IOException {     Request request = createRequest(restRequest).     return channel -> client.execute(INSTANCE, request, new RestToXContentListener<>(channel)). }

static Request createRequest(RestRequest restRequest) throws IOException {     if (restRequest.hasContentOrSourceParam()) {         try (XContentParser parser = restRequest.contentOrSourceParamParser()) {             return Request.fromXContent(parser, restRequest.param("index")).         }     } else {         Request request = new Request().         request.setFollowerIndex(restRequest.param("index")).         return request.     } }
